response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer is not just any item; it holds immense value and could significantly enhance your endeavors. Given its worth to us, we are considering a special deal for you. We propose to sell this product to you for $950,000. This price reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who appreciates its true value and aligns with our expectations for its use. We believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties to benefit. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
